name: Rock Bottom (oscarbagger)
description:
Working my first job at the bottom of the ocean. It’s a lot of pressure.

Welcome to Rock Bottom, the bar at the bottom of the ocean.  A lot of fishy personalities visit here, and you'll need tough scales to deal with them. 

Figure out what each customer wants and serve them their watered down drinks of choice.  Listen to the tales of these ocean dwellers daily lives, and you might find everything is not going swimminlgy.

A game made by:

Davide Di Staso

Fergus Doyle

Mikkel Stenkjær Hansen

Oscar Bagger

Rasmus Clausen

Simon Weber

Made for Nordic Game Jam 2023
